Posted By: MyrBattlecube (10/13/2011 9:32:07 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I put this guy in my BRG eldrazi deck and he's wicked.  
  
The deck averages 8cmc, so his cost isn't a problem. Plus, he combos with everything eldrazi. sac your drazi tokens, deal 2 damage for each 1 mana, annihilator can also potentially trigger the damage. A card like [All is Dust](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=All is Dust) becomes even more ridiculous with this dude out.  
  
Out of this deck, I do find him pretty useless. Total niche card.
posts.html:

Out of this deck, I do find him pretty useless. Total niche card.

posts.post_content:
Oh, I can just see him killing off every 1/1 spirit tokens as long as there's a first spark of death. But yeah, what is stopping people from playing it is its mana cost.  
  
As for the flavor, when you view something as "half empty", you're thinking negative whereas if you think something as "half full", you're thinking positive. In other words, this guy has not lost any hope just yet.
